STEM Tutoring

I'll Learn You Up!

About Me

Hi, I'm Laura Stevens! I'm a teaching candidate at the University of Montana, and I know a lot of stuff! Once I complete the teacher education program, I'll be certified to teach secondary science (grades 7-12); my specialties are physics, biology, and astronomy.

What do I tutor?

  • HS Earth/Space Science
  • Physics (HS, AP, university intro)
  • Astronomy (HS, university intro)
  • Bio (MS, HS, AP, university intro)
  • Chemistry (HS)
  • Math (prealgebra through calculus I)
  • Programming (Python, Scratch, HTML/CSS)

Ed Creds

  • BS Astrophysics, Physics, Biology; College of Charleston; 2013.
  • MS Geosciences, University of Montana, in progress; TA two semesters.
  • Teacher Education Program, University of Montana, in progress.
  • 2013-2014: STEM faculty, Palmetto Scholars Academy, North Charleston, SC.
